name: Oven Baked Garlic and Parmesan Fries
author: Sarah
summary: You'll love these...consider yourself warned: You'll want them every day!
ingredients: 4 large unpeeled russet potatoes, cut into 1/4-inch strips
½ cup grated Parmesan cheese, divided
directions: Preheat an oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Place the potatoes in a mixing bowl and drizzle with olive oil
Season with garlic, thyme, and 1/4 teaspoon seasoned salt
Lift the fries out of the bowl and spread onto a nonstick baking sheet in a single layer
Save the remaining oil in the bowl
Bake in the preheated oven 30 minutes, flipping the fries halfway through baking
Return the fries to the bowl with the olive oil, sprinkle with 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese and parsley
Toss to coat, then spread again onto the baking sheet
Return to the oven, and bake until the Parmesan cheese melts, about 10 minutes
Sprinkle the fries with the remaining 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese and 1/4 teaspoon seasoned salt to serve
